response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering this, I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This offer allows us both to benefit from the transaction: you receive a high-quality product at a reasonable price, while I ensure a profitable sale. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
